title: Tales of Symphonia: Ratatosk no Kishi - Onshuu no Richter
original_name: テイルズ オブ シンフォニア ―ラタトスクの騎士― 恩讐のリヒター
sinopse:
Due to natural disasters caused by the world regeneration which took place two years ago. Two researchers, Richter and Aster, are trying to find the spirit Ratatosk who seems to be the only one able of restoring the balance of mana.

(Source: Batoto)
